edu.ues.jhard.beans
Class BeanBaseJProcur

java.lang.Object
  edu.ues.jhard.beans.BeanBase
      edu.ues.jhard.beans.BeanBaseJProcur

public class BeanBaseJProcur
extends BeanBase

Author:
ramayac Notas personales: - Only use EntityManager method persist on a new entity. - Only Refresh para obtener los ultimos datos de la BD - remove to delete an entity from the database. - method flush to send updates to the database within a transaction before the transaction is committed. (unicamente en el mismo contexto)
